thread.title: TV | The Apprentice

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | The Apprentice
text: Alan Sugar returns for what will be the 11th series of this show, where this year's hopefuls stand to win a Â£250,000 investment in a new start-up company. There will be a new face joining Alan this year too, as Claude Littner replaces Nick Hewer as Lord Sugar's new adviser and 'eyes and ears' alongside Karren Brady. Sugar will kicks things off with his usual pep talk before dividing the teams up for their first task, which will be selling two fish-based products to hungry Londoners. Here's hoping there's no 'fishy' behaviour in the boardroom however.
